title: Aromatherapy Locket - Crystal Lotus - Sun's Eye
description: Wear your favorite Sun's Eye oil in a beautiful and durable stainless steel locket. Each locket comes in a gift box with an adjustable 20" stainless steel chain, 3 black felt pads to saturate with oil, and an instruction card.
cleaned_text: Wear your favorite Sun's Eye oil in a beautiful and durable stainless steel locket. Each locket comes in a gift box with an adjustable 20 stainless steel chain, 3 black felt pads to saturate with oil, and an instruction card. Wear your favorite Sun's Eye oil in a beautiful and durable stainless steel locket. Each locket comes in a gift box with an adjustable 20 stainless steel chain, 3 black felt pads to saturate with oil, and an instruction card. Care Instructions:To maintain your Sun's Eye locket, remember these care instructions: store it in a cool, dry place, remove before swimming, bathing or using hot tubs, refrain from wearing during physical activities, and gently polish with a cloth to restore its shine.
